script:
# script "lisp"
# fadein "black" 0.5
# background "sea_shipboard"
# bgmfile "bgm256" "BgmSeaDate" 0
# body %(unit_a)s
# pos %(unit_a)s 3
# mask %(unit_a)s off
# chara %(unit_a)s
# textflame 0 0
@
マスターはシタと二人で
ナイトクルーズに来ていた

# textflame 1 1
# face %(unit_a)s "sad"
# voice 2016 "shita_0021"
@シタ
わ、真っ暗…

# textflame 1 1
# face %(unit_a)s "normal"
@シタ
なんだか…
夜空と海の区別がつきませんね

# textflame 1 1
# voice 2016 "shita_0004"
@シタ
まるで夜空の中を
進んでいるみたい…

# select "星が落ちてきそう" "select_label_01" "島の光が星かな" "select_label_02" "この船も星なのかな" "select_label_03"
まるで夜空の中を
進んでいるみたい…

# textwindow "close"
# label "select_label_01"
# labeljump "select_label_end"
# waitandnext 0.1

# textwindow "close"
# label "select_label_02"
# labeljump "select_label_end"
# waitandnext 0.1

# textwindow "close"
# label "select_label_03"
# labeljump "select_label_end"
# waitandnext 0.1

# label "select_label_end"
# waitandnext 2
# fadeout "black" 1.2
